title: Leisure Hotels Group draws up plans to expand to 100 properties by 2030
description: The company, that owns and runs properties and concepts such as Aloha on the Ganges in Rishikesh; The Riverview Retreat, Corbett National Park; The Earlâ€˜s Court in Nainital; and The Manor properties in Bareilly and Kashipur, is considering locations across markets such as Udaipur, Jodhpur, Chittorgarh, Kanha, Khajuraho, Vizag, Pondicherry, Kanyakumari, Thekkady and Kodaikanal to expand further.
